description: This take on chicken skewers is perfect for BBQs, family lunches and parties. The fusion of coconut and lime is a sure crowd-pleaser. Pass the sauce, please.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Chicken,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Chicken Coconut Skewers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 tbs red curry paste (save 1 tbs for dipping sauce)

recipeInstructions.text: To make dipping sauce, swirl 1 tbs curry paste and 1 cup coconut yoghurt together in a serving bowl. Place in the fridge until ready to serve.
Mix curry paste, coconut milk, ginger and garlic in a large bowl. Add chicken and rub well with marinade. Cover and refrigerate for at least one hour (or overnight if time permits).

Preheat a barbecue or grill. Thread chicken pieces onto skewers and cook for 5 minutes each side or until charred on the outside. Preheat oven to 200Â°. Place skewers on tray and cook in oven for 10 minutes, or until cooked through.
Sprinkle skewers with coriander and serve with coconut curry dipping sauce and lime cheeks.
